snippet: A Steubenville elementary school principal will perform 40 hours of community service related to rape awareness in exchange for prosecutors’ dropping a charge that she failed to report rumors of a teenage sex and drinking party, Mike DeWine, the...
abstract: Steubenville, Ohio, elementary school principal Lynnett Gorman will perform 40 hours of community service related to rape awareness in exchange for prosecutors' dropping a charge that she failed to report rumors of a teenage sex and drinking party.
lead_paragraph: A Steubenville elementary school principal will perform 40 hours of community service related to rape awareness in exchange for prosecutors’ dropping a charge that she failed to report rumors of a teenage sex and drinking party, Mike DeWine, the state attorney general.

headline.main: Ohio: Principal Has Deal to Drop Charges Tied to Party
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Principal Has Deal yo Drop Charges Tied to Party
